text: The men's 1000 metres in speed skating at the 1994 Winter Olympics took place on 18 February, at the Hamar Olympic Hall. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing world and Olympic records were as follows: The following new World and Olympic records was set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
